001package com.technototes.library.util;
002
003/** Enum for Colors and some formatting
004 * @author Alex Stedman
005 */
006public enum Color {
007    RED("FF2222"),
008    ORANGE("EA5D00"),
009    YELLOW("FFBF00"),
010    LIME("69FF00"),
011    GREEN("00D318"),
012    CYAN("00E5E5"),
013    BLUE("1E39CE"),
014    PURPLE("5A00E2"),
015    MAGENTA("BE00FF"),
016    PINK("FF3ADC"),
017    BLACK("000000"),
018    WHITE("FFFFFF"),
019    LIGHT_GRAY("808080"),
020    DARK_GRAY("404040"),
021    NO_COLOR("FFFFFF");
022
023    String hexValue;
024
025    Color(String hex) {
026        hexValue = hex;
027    }
028
029    /** Get the hex value
030     *
031     * @return The hex for the color
032     */
033    public String getHexValue() {
034        return hexValue;
035    }
036
037    /** Format the supplied object with the HTML to become this color
038     *
039     * @param object The object
040     * @return The formatted String
041     */
042    public String format(Object object) {
043        return (
044            "<font" +
045            (this == NO_COLOR ? "" : " color=#" + getHexValue()) +
046            ">" +
047            object +
048            "</font>"
049        );
050    }
051
052    /** Format the supplied object with the HTML and a format String to become this color
053     *
054     * @param objects The objects
055     * @param format The format for the supplied String
056     * @return The formatted String
057     */
058    public String format(String format, Object... objects) {
059        return format(String.format(format, objects));
060    }
061}
